item.title: Start Blogging
item.author: Author
item.description: Welcome to my Blog! I finally find a place that I express my insight to what I learn, what I saw and what I think. I will be posting more blogs over the summer (Starting with a more detailed about me (I guess? ğŸ˜‡)). Stay tuned! . Thank you again for checking my sites.
